summary: Frontend testing completed for CAPTURE PWA - Brand territories and logo-based scratch cards verified. All 7 brand territories display correctly on the map with proper logos. Scratch card functionality works as expected with brand logos as scratchable surfaces.

issues: Console warning about Canvas2D willReadFrequently attribute - minor performance optimization opportunity

critical_code_review_comments: Canvas2D performance: Consider adding willReadFrequently: true to canvas context for better performance during scratch operations
seed_data_creation: None required - brand territories are hardcoded in GameContext.js
context_for_next_testing_agent: All brand territory and scratch card features verified working. The Whole Truth territories are in Koramangala area (south of Indiranagar) - may need to pan map to see them. Geolocation errors are expected in automated tests due to browser permission restrictions.

map_displays_7_brand_territories.details: Found 7 brand markers: MuscleBlaze (3), Super You (2), The Whole Truth (2)

brand_markers_show_correct_logos.details: All brand logos load correctly via /api/proxy-image endpoint

scratch_card_displays_brand_logo_as_surf.details: Canvas shows brand logo with 'SCRATCH ME!' text overlay

scratch_card_header_shows_brand_info.details: Header displays brand logo and 'You earned a reward from [Brand]'

scratching_reveals_prize.details: Prize info (discount, code, description) revealed after scratching

confetti_animation.details: Confetti triggers when prize is revealed (>50% scratched)

all_3_brands_working.details: MuscleBlaze (₹500 OFF, CAPTURE500), Super You (30% OFF, SUPERYOU30), The Whole Truth (FREE BAR, TRUTHBAR)

mocked_apis.authentication: User login/signup is mocked - any email/password works
